short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share the current page on social networks with preview.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
All-in-One Social Share: Simplify Content Sharing

All-in-One Social Share is a tool designed to make it easier to share content across various online platforms. Whether you’re saving links for later, sharing articles, or promoting your own content, this extension allows you to do it quickly and efficiently from one place.

---

Features:

- Preview Before Sharing: View the title, description, and image of the page before sharing.  

- Easy Sharing Options: Supports a variety of platforms and tools for sharing or saving links.  

- Compact Windows: Each sharing link opens in a dedicated window to keep your workflow focused.  

- Streamlined Design: Clean interface that reduces unnecessary clicks and simplifies the process.  

---

How It Works:

1. Install the extension and visit any webpage you want to share.  
2. Open the extension popup to view the sharing options.  
3. Select a platform or tool, and your content will be shared or saved instantly.  

---

Why Use All-in-One Social Share?

This extension provides an easy way to share or save content without switching between tabs or apps. It’s lightweight, privacy-focused, and designed to simplify sharing tasks for professionals and casual users alike.  

---

Permissions:

The extension only requests minimal permissions to access the title, description, and URL of the active page for sharing. It does not collect or store any user data.
